name: LMBSKN
bio: A multidisciplinary designer who loves stories. He discovered the supreme powers of the internet in 2008 and quickly stumbled into a career; making graphic design, websites and apps for clients. Ope directs the team at wuruwuru. In his spare time, he also leads the design team at Paystack.

name: Daniel Orubo
bio: Eris is a writer and storyboard artist. When she's not building with friends at wuruwuru, she's learning french and training her cat to understand sign language.
